text: Seventh Heaven is a 1937 American romantic drama movie directed by Henry King and is the second adaption of the 1922 play of the same name by Austin Strong. It stars Simone Simon, James Stewart, Jean Hersholt, Gregory Ratoff, John Qualen, Rollo Lloyd, Victor Kilian and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: Seventh Heaven (1937 movie)
